channel.title: SMF Issues?
channel.description: Why is it when I am hosting my own SMF, it says server is busy, try again later? I am positive all of the redirections and file names/paths are correct. I was just editing my smf and suddenly it says the SMF error. Anyone have any clues on it?

item.title: SMF Issues?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“usernamelol, post:12, topic:36250”][quote author=ilyaostr9 link=topic=51706.msg641039#msg641039 date=1166419173]
Just don’t use SMF. Torrent/phazeDDL for vBulletin 3.5.4 which, in my humble opinion, is the best…
[/quote]
lel no, just get the nulled version.[/quote]
Torrent/phazeDDL give you the null0r

Read full topic

item.title: SMF Issues?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

zoss0:

What hosting have you got?

I am hosting myself.

[quote=“usernamelol, post:8, topic:36250”][quote author=mod taharok link=topic=51706.msg636231#msg636231 date=1166355259]

Actully I think its a problem when your installing them. What is the actull error? And what were you doing at the time?

It is the same thing as the Moparscape/moparisthebest SMF error. I am sure it is installed correctly becasue I was logged on it and running everything. Oh well, I will try going on host computer in a little while and check it out (unless someone has the resoulution to my problem .)
[/quote]
If it is an MySql error then the Sql database is being overloaded or just had a time out it should come back on in a few minutes if not I have no clue. Has it gone back on? And I would just use an online host, much easier in my opinion.[/quote]

Well this way I can get easier web redirects and I can make PHP edits to my smf. I also have a lot mroe space and I control just about everything.

P.S. There error is still up, I will look on simplemachines main website if there is any packages I can download to fix it.

Read full topic
